name: Goat Man: The Game
description:
made for weekly game jam week 52 - theme: boss rush

travel to the distant land of NARNIA where you have to put and end to your once beloved husband to save the land from total chaos. based on real events.

controls:

quick attack - left mouse button

heavy attack - hold left mouse button (time it for bonus damage)

roll - right mouse button

movement - wasd

full credits:

Jan-Kristian Koivukangas - post process, music, sound

Darkhan Zholmukhanov - AI, programming

Birk Gonsholt - game design, 3d art, programming
